state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Corridor =- You arrive in a corridor. A standard one. next_state: -= Kitchen =- You have come into the most standard of all possible kitchens. Hey, want to see a fridge? Look over there, a fridge. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? On the counter you can make out a roasted green apple, a fried purple potato, a green bell pepper, a yellow apple and a raw red potato. You see a stove. The stove is conventional. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst. There is an open plain door leading north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Kitchen =-0/2
